==Trivia==
*  Tepeilhuitl is the name of the thirteenth month of the {{w|Aztec calendar}}. It is also a festival in the {{w|Aztec religion}} dedicated to {{w|Popocatépetl|Popocatepetl}}, {{w|Iztaccihuatl}} and {{w|Tlaloc}}. It is called the festival or feast of the Mountains.
